trans-unit.source: Represents the center panel of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o painel central de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a parte superior, inferior, esquerda e direita painéis do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>para manter <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripContentPanel to hold controls other than these.
trans-unit.target: Use ToolStripContentPanel para manter os controles que não sejam essas.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The mode by which the content panel automatically resizes itself.
trans-unit.target: O modo pelo qual o painel de conteúdo é redimensionado automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: Overridden to ensure that the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> reflects the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Substituído para garantir que a cor de fundo de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref> reflete a cor de fundo de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure representing the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que representa a cor de fundo de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnLoad method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnLoad também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs>, which contains all the information necessary to render the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs>, que contém todas as informações necessárias para processar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnPaintBackground method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPaintBackground também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.
